Address.value: 10225 WESTMOOR DRIVE, WESTMINSTER, Colorado, 80021, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: ZimVie Inc is focused on the dental and spine markets and their respective growth drivers such as implants, surgical tools, bone graft substitutes, spinal fusion implants, non-fusion alternatives, and digital care management solutions. Business is organized into two operating segments being the spine products segment and the dental products segment.

value.name: Steve Rondeau
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
